use.flag: Enables submodule ecore.evas to be built, supporting dev-libs/ecore with USE=evas.
Enables submodule ecore.x to be built, supporting dev-libs/ecore with USE=X.
Enables submodule ecore.x.screensaver to be built, supporting dev-libs/ecore with USE=xscreensaver.

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Exposes Ecore library as Python module.
Ecore handles Enlightenment Foundation Libraries (EFL) main loop and basic Input/Output systems such as X11, DirectFB, FrameBuffer as well as functionality around it, with Networking (libcurl) and so on. The python bindings are not as extensive, but covers the basic usage for most applications.
Optionally provides access to Evas through ecore.evas module, if "evas" flag is used.
Optionally provides access to X11 through ecore.x module, if "X" flag is used.
Optionally provides access to X ScreenSaver extension through ecore.x.screensaver module, if "xscreensaver" flag is used.
